items.title: Chinese authorities are using a new tool to hack seized phones and extract data
items.description: Researchers warned that Chinese residents, and visitors to China, should be aware of the tool's existence and the risks it poses.

items.title: Of course, Grok’s AI companions want to have sex and burn down schools
items.description: xAI's first AI companions on the Grok app are a lustful anime girl and a homicidal panda.

items.title: The Chainsmokers’ Mantis Ventures closes $100M third fund
items.description: The fund brings Mantis' assets under management to $225 million.

items.title: Amazon’s Kuiper satellites to get boost from rival SpaceX
items.description: Amazon is looking to its main competitor to get its next batch of Kuiper satellites to orbit.

items.title: US Army soldier pleads guilty to hacking telcos and extortion
items.description: Cameron Wagenius had already pleaded guilty to other charges earlier this year.
